subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Golden Globes (Awards)
lead_paragraph: The five-time All-Star Reggie Miller and the longtime coach Don Nelson were chosen for the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame on Monday.
snippet: The five-time All-Star Reggie Miller and the longtime coach Don Nelson were chosen for the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame on Monday.
